pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create FDA-Style Data and Program Definitions // Creates a directory of archived files with a descriptive 'PDF' document at the root level (i.e. 'define.pdf') containing tables of definitions of data items and relative-path hyperlinks to the documented files. Converts file extensions to 'txt' per FDA expectations and converts 'CSV' files to 'SAS' Transport format. Relies on data item descriptors stored as per R package 'spec'. See 'package?define'. See also '?define'. Requires a compatible installation of 'pdflatex', e.g. https://miktex.org/.
